name: Car Factory!
description:
Are you ready to run your own tycoon factory and become the richest man ever?

- Unlock all super cars!
- Sell the BEST of them!
- Generate green electricity with a windmill!
- Upgrade your production lines! to make more money
- Earn millions and billions while you're offline 
- Tap-Tap-Tap to increase your productivity

Enjoy and be rich!
